name: aftenposten.no - all clean 2010-01-09
description:
Okey, here it is.
The other stylish plugin to this page is pretty old by now.
Soo therefore i created this one, didn' t have anything else to do so, why not:-)

* ALL ads removes, even the "little" "annonse pics" from all pages, (may have missed someone).
Please inform me below if i need to change anything, because i don't check the site all the time.

Cheers..

/Ratcher
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document url(http://www.aftenposten.no/),
url-prefix(http://www.aftenposten.no/nyheter/sport/),
url-prefix(http://www.aftenposten.no/nyheter/),
url-prefix(http://www.aftenposten.no/meninger/),
url-prefix(http://www.aftenposten.no/okonomi/),
url-prefix(http://www.aftenposten.no/kul_und/),
url-prefix(http://oslopuls.aftenposten.no/),
url-prefix(http://www.aftenposten.no/reise/),
url-prefix(http://www.aftenposten.no/forbruker/),
url-prefix(http://www.aftenposten.no/jobb/),
url-prefix(http://www.aftenposten.no/bolig/),
url-prefix(http://www.aftenposten.no/vaer/),
url-prefix(http://dinmat.aftenposten.no/),
url-prefix(http://www.aftenposten.no/)
{
.adposition,
#boligad,
#dm-rightadd,
#oas_ads_header,
#adButtons,
#adRight,
#x50,
#annonser,
#x04,
#annonser-topp,
#leftad,
#rightad,
#google_ads_frame1,
#col3usersFavourites,
#s3LoginModuleNotLoggedIn,
#s3LoginModuleLoggedIn,
#linkUser,
#col3usersFavourites,
#adFilmWeb,
#ad,
#pageHeaderAds,
#FlashID1x,
#profiledMgmtJobsList,
#profiledJobsList,
#tickerAdinner,
#techsource_Bottom3,
#FLASH_AD,
#extFlashMiddle1,
#FinContentMiddle1,
#techsource_Middle,
#FinContentTop21,
#techsource_Top2,
#FlashID4x,
#techsource_Bottom,
#extFlashx011,
#FinContentx011,
#techsource_x01,
#extFlashx031,
#FinContentx031,
#techsource_x03,
#norwegian,
#extFlashx501,
#FinContentx501,
#techsource_x50,
#printRemove,
#extFlashRight11,
#FinContentRight11,
#techsource_Right1,
#DCF220808575,
#form_film,
#tekst
#form_musikk,
#tekst,
#form_litteratur,
#reviewsBox,
#connect_widget_button4b47fb67,
#megaBoard,
#footer
{
display: none !important;
}
*[src*="http://ad.aftenposten.no/"],
*[src*="http://track.adform.net/"],
div.reklam
{
display: none !important;
}
.footer, 
.adHorisontalNoBorder,
.adButtons,
.adMarker, 
.adHorisontal, 
.ad-180x500,
.facebook,
.ad,
.ad-marker,
.megaBoard,
.theAdvertisement 
{
display: none !important;
}
}
